title: Shipped
logline: A solo builder turns doubt into momentum and ships.
style: cinematic, modern tech noir, 35mm film grain, rain reflections, rich contrast

characters.name: Alex
characters.visual: young adult, tired eyes, dark hoodie, slightly hunched posture

characters.name: Mira
characters.visual: no avatar; plain terminal prompt labeled Mira (local)

lines.speaker: NARRATOR
lines.text: Rain writes slow lines on the window while the cursor blinks.
Alex scrolls a hype feed, then closes the tab.

lines.speaker: NARRATOR
lines.text: The terminal warns again; the checklist stays half-done like a dare.

lines.speaker: MIRA
lines.text: Three steps: fix the failing test, update config, run release.

lines.speaker: NARRATOR
lines.text: Keys clack—green passes stack—progress turns into proof.

lines.speaker: NARRATOR
lines.text: One last command, and the screen settles on shipped.
